long_description: This handmade Peterboro large oak bike basket is made in the picturesque Monadnock region of New Hampshire, the source of lovely, handcrafted wood baskets for more than a century and a half. Features a honey-colored finish and leather straps that buckle onto your handlebars. Comes with Peterboro brass medallion.
short_description: This handmade Peterboro large oak bike basket is made in the picturesque Monadnock region of New Hampshire, the source of lovely, handcrafted wood baskets for more than a century and a half.
